Mr. Seymour Siegel
WNYC
New York City, New York
Dear Si:
The designation of someone to represent NAEB as an observer to
the United Nations is not as simple a matter as it would appear.
In the first place, isn't this a spot that would normally be filled
by the next President or Executive Director? Jim's successor will
be named by the middle of April no doubt but the next President will
not be named^naturaU^r until the NAEB Fall meeting.
If, as you say, "the time has come" and we must name someone
now, I'd like to suggest Burton Paulu as first choice. I would
suggest Bernie Buck as second man except that you will be there to
represent your station and NAEB and it would be well to have some
other station represented perhaps. Beyond this point, therefore, I
have no suggestions.
GA/ns
